coref: An Ass found a Lion's skin left in the forest by a hunter. An Ass dressed An Ass in it, and amused An Ass by hiding in a thicket and rushing out suddenly at the animals who passed that way. All took to their heels the moment their saw An Ass. An Ass An Ass was so pleased to see the animals who passed that way running away from An Ass, just as if An Ass were King Lion himself, that An Ass could not keep from expressing An Ass delight by a loud, harsh bray. A Fox, who ran with the rest, stopped short as soon as An Ass heard the voice. Approaching An Ass, An Ass said with a laugh: If you had kept your mouth shut you might have frightened me, too. But you gave yourself away with that silly bray.
